name: Rascal on the Run
description:
Run,  jump and activate you shield to deflect projectiles in this run and gun platformer without a gun. Rascal On The Run is a game created  for the Genre Minus Mechanic game jam. Escape the facility as character CodeName Rascal and deliver the Citadels secret terraforming plans to the Rebel Rousers.  Good Luck!

Controls: Move(a/d) Jump(left click) Shield (right click)
